channel.title: Helix Plugin Center
channel.description: Recent content on Helix Plugin Center

item.title: Bodygroup Manager
item.description: Bodygroup Manager Installation Download the folder as a .zip Place inside of your schema/plugins folder Preview Support Gary#1170

item.title: Better Description Display
item.description: A better description display for when you look at people.

item.title: Weight
item.description: Allows for weight to be added to items.

item.title: Class Whitelists
item.description: Allows classes to be obtainable with whitelists. Add the below funtion to any class you wish to restrict to whitelists. function CLASS:CanSwitchTo(client) return client:HasClassWhitelist(self.index) end

item.title: Overwatch Voices
item.description: Adds all the missing CP voice lines from the HL2 Beta Leak as well as adding in voice lines for Airwatch.

item.title: Player Flags
item.description: Allows flags to be assigned to players rather than characters.

item.title: Legs
item.description: Renders the characters legs to the local player.

item.title: Flashlight item
item.description: ix-flashlight A flashlight item for Helix. Released to the public domain. Installation Download the zip Extract it into your Schema's plugin folder

item.title: Anti-AFK
item.description: Stops AFK players from earning wages and kicks when server is full.

item.title: Warmth
item.description: Adds a warmth dependency for characters.

item.title: Perma Remove
item.description: Allows staff to permanently remove map entities.

item.title: Localized damage
item.description: Damage are different depending on which limb is being hurt.

item.title: Disable Character Swap
item.description: Prevents players from switching characters when enabled.

item.title: Local Event
item.description: Adds in a new /LocalEvent command only heard from a certain distance, it appears in yellow rather than orange.

item.title: Persistent Corpses
item.description: Makes player corpses stay on the map after the player has respawned.
